thread.title: Save up to 50% on airport lounge entry with DragonPass
thread.title_full: Save up to 50% on airport lounge entry with DragonPass - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save up to 50% on airport lounge entry with DragonPass
text: Telegraph readers can claim discounted entry to more than 750 airport lounges worldwide with DragonPass. Annual membership is normally £50 plus the cost of the individual lounge entry price. With this offer there is no membership fee; you simply need to pay £15 per person per visit, saving up to 50% of the cost of the lounge entry. DragonPass delivers a world class travel experience to over four million members all over the world regardless of flight class or airline. Make sure you enjoy your journey from the start and avoid the stresses of a crowded airport. What's included in your visit Enjoy a selection of hot and cold food, a wide range of wines, beers, spirits and juices, or simply relax with a cup of coffee, tea or hot chocolate. Lounges also have free WIFI, a wide range of magazines and newspapers, and some lounges include family areas. How to claim See the newspaper on Saturday, August 1, 2015 Subscribers get more If you are a subscriber, you can claim this offer all year round. Click here for more details. @telegraph
